Name: Well-fortified
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Bamboo meets a Vodka Martini in this boozy, vodka-laced aromatic aperitif cocktail, so named due to this cocktail packing a trio of fortified wines.
History: Created by yours truly at The Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Well-fortified contains 211 calories
